description:
Don't wait for your favorite catalogs and circulars to show up by snail mail. Shop for sales year-round on your iPad with the most downloaded catalog app & winner of the Appy Award for the best Retail Shopping app. The go-to app that really showcases catalogs on the iPad mini or your Retina iPad Air!

Pledge to go green. Save a tree. Unsubscribe from printed catalogs. Check out eco-friendly items from catalogs from MOMA or National Geographic.

Featured in NY Times, USA Today, InStyle, Lucky magazine, Forbes & WSJ, Catalogue is a new way to browse through all your favorite store catalogs in one easy-to-use iPad app. It includes the latest from leading fashion catalogs (men, women, kids), beauty, toys, home retailers, and more. 

Flip through your favorite catalogs such as Williams-Sonoma, Crate & Barrel, J.Crew, Nordstrom, Saks, Ross Simons, Sharper Image, Brookstone, Sur la Table, Free People, Delia's and circulars from Best Buy and Macy*s. Simply swipe to browse, or save products that you like with just a quick tap. Discover new products using our search feature – it’s fun and endless. Download today and try it out – it’s FREE! 

• Features • 

Catalogs on-the-go, all in one place. 

• A simple, clean interface allows for easy browsing
• Save your favorite items or entire catalogs for the next time you return
• Tear-&-Share (as close as you can get to tearing out a printed catalog page & sharing)
• Search for items, or simply browse through popular categories
• Recent store email, news, offers and deals collated inside the app conveniently


• Did you know? • 

5.6 million tons of catalogs and other direct mail advertisements end up in U.S. landfills annually. We are doing our bit to help reduce the number of unwanted catalog subscriptions, and save natural resources. To find out more, visit us at TheFind.com. 

• Privacy • 

We adhere to strict privacy standards and will never share or sell your personal information. Read our privacy policy in the Settings tab. 

• Tell Us What You Think • 
Have suggestions for a catalog we can add, or feedback? We'd love to hear from you! Email us at catalogue @ thefind.com.
trackCensoredName: Catalogue by TheFind - the award winning catalog shopping app
